description: This file defines a React functional component named Metrics that displays inventory metrics using a line chart with data fetched from an API endpoint.

methods.name: Metrics (function component)
methods.description: React component that fetches inventory metrics data and renders a line chart displaying stock and usage evolution.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function that retrieves data from API endpoint and updates component state; provides fallback data on error.
